thread.title: Ellen Pao blames court for failing to help fight gender discrimination, drops appeal
thread.title_full: Ellen Pao blames court for failing to help fight gender discrimination, drops appeal - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Ellen Pao blames court for failing to help fight gender discrimination, drops appeal
text: The whole thing is over now. Ellen Pao said in an op-ed in Re/code today that she is dropping her appeal against her former employer, the venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins, and moving on. She says she will pay the court costs a court ruled she owes after losing a landmark gender l discrimination case against […] »
